channel.title: Weird Hood On Player

item.title: Weird Hood On Player
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Well first of all not sure if this the right section since I’m not sure if it’s a model problem or maybe something with the ints but my Skillcape Hoods when worn look weird the area around the mouth becomes the color of the hood
Here’s a picture: Left is correct, Right is incorrect look around the mouth area to see the difference.

If it’s a model problem would someone please upload the correct model? And if its with the ints here are the ints for my Runecrafting Skillcape Hood again I’m not why this happens all help is appreciated, thanks.
Ints:

if(i == ####){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 960; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 22464; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 43968; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 99; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 99; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 99; class8.anInt174 = 24203; class8.anInt181 = 720; class8.anInt190 = 0; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 24202; class8.anInt200 = 24202; class8.aString170 = "RuneCrafting hood"; class8.aByteArray178 = "RuneCrafting skillcape hood.".getBytes(); }
